title: @RiotKateyKhaos  Can you please do this?
body:
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/398qq5/regarding_the_new_draven_skin/

mirror:  I have mained Draven for a VERY long time, and I have dreamed of the day when I could finally wield inflatable axes. Now that day is here. But are you meaning to tell me when i throw those axes they arent gonna make squeaky noises when i throw them? I mean anything, just that noise that ziggs makes when he explodes his satchel in pool party ziggs. I speak for draven mains everywhere when I say, make those axes squeaky!
